attributes.action: save millions of trees by encouraging the far healthier use of washing instead of toilet paper.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Western Nations destroy literally millions of trees annually to produce toilet paper which we then wash down the toilet.It is far cleaner, healthier and more hygienic to wash oneself after using the toilet.The move would cost us absolutely NOTHING but would be greatly beneficial to reducing global warming.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
